outline:
1. to prophesy
    1. (Niphal)
      1. to prophesy
        1. under influence of divine spirit
        2. of false prophets
      2. (Hithpael)
        1. to prophesy
          1. under influence of divine spirit
          2. of false prophets
strongs_def: to prophesy, i.e. speak (or sing) by inspiration (in prediction or simple discourse)
